basics.name: Weidong Huang
basics.label: Reinforcement Learning & Robotics Researcher
basics.summary: Research engineer focused on reinforcement learning, world models, imitation learning, and humanoid robot control.

work.name: Robotics Lab, Beijing Institute of General Artificial Intelligence
work.summary: Humanoid locomotion research supervised by Yao Su, Jingwen Zhang, Yaodong Yang.
highlights: Delivered sim-to-real RL pipeline for humanoid walking with low energy cost and stable real-world deployment.

work.name: Tencent AI Lab
work.summary: Worked with Haobo Fu and Qing Wang on imitation learning for games.
highlights: Built imitation learning system for Honor of Kings.
Explored exponentially weighted imitation learning for diverse skill generation.

work.name: Peking University
work.summary: Safe reinforcement learning with world models under Yaodong Yang.
highlights: Investigated constrained policy optimization and model-based SafeRL.

awards.title: Excellent Blog Posts in Kanxue Forum (120k+ reads)
Alibaba Tianchi Competition: Malicious Encrypted Traffic Identification (top 1%, 4k+ teams)
Honorable Mention, American Mathematical Contest in Modeling

publications.name: Towards Bridging the Gap between Large-Scale Pretraining and Efficient Finetuning for Humanoid Control
publications.summary: Scalable RL framework combining SAC pretraining and physics-informed world-model finetuning for humanoid control.

publications.name: ECO: Energy-Constrained Optimization with Reinforcement Learning for Humanoid Walking
publications.summary: Energy and gait-symmetry constrained RL for efficient and robust humanoid walking.

publications.name: SafeDreamer: Safe Reinforcement Learning with World Models
publications.summary: World-model-based constrained policy optimization to achieve zero-cost safety performance.

publications.name: MA-SafeDreamer: Multi-Agent Constrained Policy Optimization via World Models
publications.summary: Extends SafeDreamer to cooperative multi-agent safety tasks with CTDE.

publications.name: OmniSafe: An Infrastructure for Accelerating Safe Reinforcement Learning Research
publications.summary: Led model-based RL module development; contributed over 13,000 lines to the library.

publications.name: Safety-Gymnasium: A Unified Safe Reinforcement Learning Benchmark
